chapters.title: Chapter 12:  A Bargain
chapters.info: Zaida din Parede Black Wing, p. 310 (368)—Wavemistress of Clan Catelar of the Atha'an Miere. She is very commanding, and expects obedience from everyone. She is short, quite beautiful, and has streaks of gray in her tightly-curled hair. Her dark face appears to grow more beautiful with the passing of time. Zaida was the the ambassador to Rand from Nesta din Reas, Mistress of the Ships to the Sea Folk, until Nesta's death at the hands of the Seanchan. There is a distinct possibility that Zaida herself will replace Nesta as the Mistress of the Ships.
